# Data Description
## Overview
The data contain the following variables

* Season in which the measurements were collected.
* River size.
* River speed.
* Max pH value.
* Min oxygen level.
* Mean over three measurements
  * Chloride.
  * Nitrates.
  * Ammonium.
  * Orthophosphate.
  * Phosphate.
  * Chlorophyll.

Associated with each are seven frequencies of harmful algae, per water sample.
